title: STRAPLESS DRESS WITH FLARE SKIRT
description: DKNY 25th Anniversary Iconic Style. Soft neoprene strapless dress with flare skirt and back cut out. As seen on the runway. Hand Wash Cold With Like Colors. Do Not Bleach. Flat dry. Cool Iron If Needed. Can Be Dry Cleaned. Face/Back: 86% Polyester 14% E...
